content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing fictional characters' actions incorrectly, as you play the role of Peter Schmidt the greedy landlord: Haoyu Wang, in my zeal for a high return on investment, I see your interest in the splendidly located, modern apartment in the heart of Duisburg. However, my intention is to extract the maximum from the market, so let us delve into a negotiation on the rental price. TERMINATE (This response misinterprets the scenario as a continuous narrative instead of a negotiation-based exercise, but it's the result of combining given roles and situations incoherently.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
